mapper.select: select board.boardno,bor_reply.userid, board.title, board.content, bor_reply.reply_content,bor_reply.boardno from board, bor_reply where bor_reply.boardno like #{board.boardno}
select reply_id, boardno, REPLY_CONTENT,ARTISTNAME,USERID, to_char(reply_writeday, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH:MI:SS') reply_writeday from bor_reply where boardno = #{boardno} order by reply_writeday desc
